00009 #pragma once
00010 
00011 #include "hope/tuple/flat_tuple.h"
00012 #include "hope/tuple/tuple_from_struct.h"
00013 #include "hope/components/user_defined_types.h"
00014 #include <functional>
00015 
00020 namespace hope {
00021 
00022     namespace detail {
00023 
00024         template<typename T>
00025         constexpr std::enable_if_t<!is_user_defined_type_v<T>, bool>
00026             is_equal(const T& left, const T& right);
00027 
00028         template<typename... Ts, std::size_t... Is>
00029         constexpr bool is_equal(const flat_tuple<Ts...>& left, const flat_tuple<Ts...>& right, std::index_sequence<Is...>);
00030 
00031         template<typename T>
00032         constexpr std::enable_if_t<is_user_defined_type_v<T>, bool>
00033             is_equal(const T& left, const T& right);
00034 
00035         template<typename T>
00036         constexpr std::enable_if_t<!is_user_defined_type_v<T>, bool>
00037             is_equal(const T& left, const T& right) {
00038             return left == right;
00039         }
00040 
00041         template<typename... Ts, std::size_t... Is>
00042         constexpr bool is_equal(const flat_tuple<Ts...>& left, const flat_tuple<Ts...>& right, std::index_sequence<Is...>) {
00043             return (is_equal(left.template get<Is>(), right.template get<Is>()) && ...);
00044         }
00045 
00046         template<typename T>
00047         constexpr std::enable_if_t<is_user_defined_type_v<T>, bool>
00048             is_equal(const T& left, const T& right) {
00049             return tuple_from_struct(left, field_policy::reference{}) == tuple_from_struct(right, field_policy::reference{});
00050         }
00051 
00052         template<typename T>
00053         constexpr std::size_t hash(const T& val) {
00054             return std::hash<T>{}(val);
00055         }
00056 
00057         template<typename... Ts, std::size_t... Is>
00058         constexpr std::size_t hash(const flat_tuple<Ts...>& tuple, std::index_sequence<Is...>) {
00059             constexpr auto tuple_size = size(type_list<Ts...>{});
00060             return (std::size_t(hash(tuple. template get<Is>()) / tuple_size) + ...);
00061         }
00062     }
00063 
00064     template <typename... Ts>
00065     constexpr bool operator==(const flat_tuple<Ts...>& left, const flat_tuple<Ts...>& right) {
00066         using tuple_t = flat_tuple<Ts...>;
00067         return detail::is_equal(left, right, std::make_index_sequence<tuple_t::get_size()>());
00068     }
00069 
00070     template <typename... Ts>
00071     constexpr bool operator!=(const flat_tuple<Ts...>& left, const flat_tuple<Ts...>& right) {
00072         return !(left == right);
00073     }
00074 
00075     template <typename... Ts>
00076     constexpr bool operator<(const flat_tuple<Ts...>& left, const flat_tuple<Ts...>& right) {
00077         return detail::is_equal(left, right, std::make_index_sequence<flat_tuple<Ts...>::size>());
00078     }
00079 
00080     template <typename... Ts>
00081     struct hash final {
00082         constexpr std::size_t operator()(const flat_tuple<Ts...>& tuple) {
00083             return detail::hash(tuple, std::make_index_sequence < size(type_list<Ts...>{})() > ());
00084         }
00085     };
00086 }
00087 
00088 template <typename TStruct>
00089 constexpr std::enable_if_t<hope::is_user_defined_type_v<TStruct>, bool>
00090 operator==(const TStruct& left, const TStruct& right) {
00091     return hope::tuple_from_struct(left, hope::field_policy::reference{}) == hope::tuple_from_struct(right, hope::field_policy::reference{});
00092 }
